intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the creation of an overview analysis of the content of a database. This kind of analysis gives you an overview of the number of tables and the number of rows per table. It counts also the number of indexes and primary keys...

item.title: Set the analysis metadata.
item.description: This step opens the analysis creation wizard. You can right click on the "Analysis" folder or on a column (or click the link below). This wizard helps you to fill the analysis metadata (name, purpose, description....).

item.title: Set Filters
item.description: You can set filters on the table names and view names to restrict the analysis.
